name: SPELL BLOCKS
description:
SPELL BLOCKS

We made this little game with Julialalart for "A game by it's cover" Jam 2021 ! We choose this awesome cartridge by RickyWill as reference : https://famicase.com/21/ You have to reproduce some patterns to cast spells and score !

LINKS:
